branchCategory.name: CH(D)KD(20-25), Compact Hydraulic Cylinder Series
branchCategory.description: <p>CH series hydraulic cylinders are available in compact, round body, JIS or tie-rod types. Nominal pressure ranges from 3.5MPa to 10MPa. Bore sizes are available, depending on the series, from 20 to 160. Auto switches are available on most models.</p>
